introText1: This is the Abbaye de Déols
introText2: We will learn a lot of things about the abbaye. It has a rich history spanning several centuries.
abbayeInfo: The Abbaye de Déols, founded in 917, was one of the most important Benedictine abbeys in Berry. It played a significant role in the religious and cultural life of the region for centuries. The abbey's architecture was a remarkable example of Romanesque style, with later Gothic additions. Despite its destruction during the French Revolution, the remaining ruins still testify to its former grandeur.
